title: Group of cards for trade including T206 Cobb
author: caramelcard

posts.post_title: Group of cards for trade including T206 Cobb
posts.post_content:
Hi guys,

I have a bunch of cards that I've wrangled up to trade for stuff I need for sets.

The availables:

W600 Matty trimmed, but presentable
T206 Cobb Red Portrait PSA 2mk with Polar Bear back
E94 McGraw green SGC 20 
T200 Cleveland with Joe Jax
1914 Cracker Joe Tinker
T213-3 Doyle
E98 Dooin w/ blue Old Put poor but tough
W575-1 Wood
W575-1 McGraw 
W575-1 Marranville with Henry Johnson stamped back
Uncat John McGraw card
T213-1 Miller Huggins Portrait
P2 Group of 13 with Chase
M116 Group of 8
Zeenut Yellowhorse
T219 Jack Johnson blue background

What I'm looking for:

T204 Ramlys
M116 need many
E90 tougher players
T205 Joss, Speaker, Johnson, Young
T207 still need 20 or so
D322 Dreyfuss

Scans are available at [url]www.imageevent.com/caramelcard[/url]
Email to [url]robertadesso@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
